tool_description: Assesses pore visibility and size across different facial areas to determine pore-related concerns.

nose_pore_size.description: Nose pore visibility (1-5, where 1=barely visible, 5=very large)

blackhead_presence.description: Whether blackheads are visible in pores

error_messages: Invalid pore size scale: All pore size parameters must be integers between 1-5.
Incomplete pore assessment: All four facial areas must be evaluated for comprehensive analysis.
Missing blackhead information: blackhead_presence parameter is required.
usage: Examine pores in good lighting, preferably natural light. Assess each facial area separately using the 1-5 scale where 1 means pores are barely visible and 5 means very prominent.

problem_areas.description: Facial areas with most prominent pores

improvement_potential.description: Expected improvement level with proper care
